title: Potato Dumplings Stuffed with Smoked Meat
instructions: Prepare the filling: Heat pork lard in a pan and sauté the finely chopped onion until translucent. Add the smoked meat, season with salt and pepper, and sauté for about 5 minutes. Set aside.
Prepare the dumpling dough: Grate the cooked potatoes finely into a bowl. Add the flour and egg and work by hand into a smooth dough.
Divide the dough into about 15 equal portions. Flatten each portion, fill with the smoked meat mixture, shape into balls, and seal well.
Cook the dumplings in a pot of boiling water until they float to the surface. Remove and drain.

Prepare the sauerkraut: In the same pan used for the meat, sauté the finely chopped onion in pork lard. Add the drained sauerkraut, season with a pinch of salt and sugar, and sauté for about 10 minutes.
Prepare the caramelized onions: Slice the onions into larger pieces, lightly salt them, and sauté over low heat until golden brown and caramelized.
Serve the stuffed dumplings with sauerkraut, topped with caramelized onions and sprinkled with fresh parsley.
